summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to sick leave for certain City officers and employees; reducing the waiting period for use of sick leave with pay by certain new employees, eliminating restrictions on use of sick leave on account of pregnancy, removing as to certain employees the maximum limitation on benefits for accumulated and unused sick leave upon retirement, and amending Section 1 of Ordinance 88522 and Sections 1 and 1.1 of Ordinance 90789.
